Package org.sindice.siren.analysis.attributes

Token's attributes used during JSON indexing

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DatatypeAttribute
    The datatype of a token.
    NodeAttribute
    The node path of a token.
    NodeNumericTermAttribute
    Expert: This class provides an Attribute for the NumericTokenizer for indexing numeric values that can be used by NodeNumericRangeQuery.
    PositionAttribute
    The position of a token within a node.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatatypeAttributeImpl
    Default implementation of DatatypeAttribute.
    JsonNodeAttributeImpl
    Implementation of NodeAttribute for a token coming from the JsonTokenizer.
    NodeNumericTermAttributeImpl
    Default implementation of the NodeNumericTermAttribute.
    PositionAttributeImpl
    Default implementation of PositionAttribute.
    TupleNodeAttributeImpl Deprecated

Package org.sindice.siren.analysis.attributes Description

Token's attributes used during JSON indexing

Introduction

This package contains a number of token's attributes that are used to attach metadata to a token such as:
  • NodeAttribute stores the dewey code of the node from which this token comes from.
  • PositionAttribute stores the position of the token relative to a node.
  • NodeNumericTermAttribute stores a numeric value and is used by NumericTokenizer for indexing numeric values.
  • DatatypeAttribute stores the datatype of the node from which this token comes from.
